title: New & MPfree: Air France – It Feels Good To Be Around You
content:
Air France are back with It Feels Good To Be Around You, their first new track in over three years, and as expected from the Swedish duo, it’s four minutes of gloriously uplifting harmonies.

Co-produced by Manchester beat maker and CitR favourite Star Slinger, he’s certainly left his distinctive mark on the track, ensuring that the bliss induced euphoria is a prominent as on his own music. The vaguely tribal disco elements found in the choruses are exaggerated to dizzying proportions, whilst the layered female vocals add an extra level of density to It Feels Good To Be Around You. Released soon via Sincerely Yours, the track is available as a free download below.

Air France – It Feels Good To Be Around You by The Line Of Best Fit
